GreatGatsby.Title: The Great Gatsby
GreatGatsby.Description: A classic novel written by F. Scott Fitzgerald...

1984.Description: George Orwell's dystopian novel '1984' delves into the dangers of totalitarianism and extreme political ideology, presenting a chilling view of a future society under constant surveillance and control.

PrideandPrejudice.Title: Pride and Prejudice
PrideandPrejudice.Description: Jane Austen's beloved novel, 'Pride and Prejudice', follows the life of Elizabeth Bennet as she navigates issues of class, family, and love in early 19th-century England.

MobyDick.Title: Moby Dick
MobyDick.Description: 'Moby Dick' by Herman Melville tells the story of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt the great white whale, exploring themes of vengeance, fate, and humanity's struggle against nature.
